trans-unit.source: Results returned after a call to <see cref="M:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges" /> when enumerating operation responses returned by the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse" /> class.
trans-unit.target: I risultati restituiti dopo una chiamata a <see cref="M:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges" /> durante l'enumerazione delle risposte dell'operazione restituite dalla classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.ChangeOperationResponse> objects are not intended to be constructed directly by a user of this library.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.ChangeOperationResponse> non devono essere costruiti direttamente da un utente di questa libreria.

trans-unit.source: Instead, references are returned when enumerating the operation responses returned via the enumerator on the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: Al contrario, i riferimenti vengono restituiti durante l'enumerazione delle risposte dell'operazione restituite tramite l'enumeratore sulla classe <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> submits pending changes to the data service collected by the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> since the last call to <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> invia al servizio dati le modifiche in sospeso raccolte da <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> dall'ultima chiamata a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Changes are added to the context by calling <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddObject%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddLink%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteObject%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteLink%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.Detach%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DetachLink%2A>, and similar methods.
trans-unit.target: Le modifiche vengono aggiunte al contesto chiamando <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddObject%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddLink%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteObject%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteLink%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.Detach%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DetachLink%2A> e metodi simili.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> returns a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> that represents the response to all operations sent to the data service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> restituisce un <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> che rappresenta la risposta a tutte le operazioni inviate al servizio dati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> object includes a sequence of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.ChangeOperationResponse> objects that, in turn, contain a sequence of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor> or <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor> instances that represent the changes that were persisted or attempted.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> include una sequenza di oggetti <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.ChangeOperationResponse> che a loro volta contengono una sequenza di istanze di <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor> o <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor> che rappresentano le modifiche rese persistenti o che sono state tentate.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to process the results of a call to <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nel codice seguente viene illustrato come elaborare i risultati di una chiamata a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor" /> or <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor" /> modified by a change operation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor" /> o <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor" /> modificato da un'operazione di modifica.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor" /> or <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor" /> modified by a change operation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor" /> o <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor" /> modificato da un'operazione di modifica.
